summary: This is a small retexture of Linwe\'s armor, changed some of the texture for chainmail and some small recoloring.
descriptionHtml:
You can use the console to get this if you don\'t already have them in your inventory. 

The code is 00108544

I believe this is a very unique armor in the game (I take it only this Linwe uses it) so I don\'t believe it warrants for a standalone version.

Also the chainmail hood can be found here:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7374
author: Sasquatcho
